Reviews.Title: “Berlin Apartments”
Reviews.Author: boyne
Reviews.Content: Excellent value for money apartment in a good location. 15 mins walk from the Brandenburg gate. Two bedroom apartment with plenty of space. Kitchen included but with no utensils!

Reviews.Title: “Good place to explore berlin”
Reviews.Author: Alexander W
Reviews.Content: We had a good stay for two nights in this place. They have tranferred apartments into hotel rooms, but in is cas it was a good move, as you may stay with the whole family in a little outdated apartment, have our kitchen, but use the breakfast facilities on the first floor with an excellent breakfast. Wifi is weak on the 9th floor.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and Simple but nothing special”
Reviews.Author: Georgia W
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this hotel is its location, right next to potsdamer platz where you can find a number of things to entertain including cinemas, casino, theatre, malls, bars etc. The rooms are fine, very basic and large but not in a great way. They look empty more than anything. The worste thing about this hote was the receptionist. On christmas day we had no idea what to do as everything appeared to be closed. We went down to the front desk to ask for advise and were suprised when we ask for reccomendations about activities, places or restraunts to recieve the answer NO. Very odd. But overall this hotel worked for us, i did notice a number of other hotels in the area though that i would probably choose over this one in the future.

Reviews.Title: “SMALL BOUTIQUE HOTEL .. clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: Solotraveller888
Reviews.Content: around 5 blocks away from postdamer platz where you can eat shop and watch movies. rooms are very clean . its located in a quiet neighborhood ... a few restaurants near the place.

Reviews.Title: “Fab location, views and breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: hammerthief
Reviews.Content: Excellent location very close to Potsdammer platz and the Sony Centre. The rooms we had were excellent, clean, warm and in good condition with nice furniture. The kitchen was very well equiped. Breakfast had a superb range of choice and if you couldn't find several things to tempt you i would be amazed.

Reviews.Title: “LOVELY HOTEL IN THE CENTER OF BERLIN- GREAT VALUE FOR MONEY”
Reviews.Author: ROULA-THANOS
Reviews.Content: Me and my wife we stayed for 6 day during the Xmas holiday at the hotel. The hotel is in very covenient location 2 min on foot from the Potzadamer plaz. Great connection with Sban, metro and buses.It is located in a very nice and quite are with a lot of shops, cafe, restaurants, cinemas, shopping mall just a short walk around. We stayed on the rooms section and not on the appartments. Our room was big enough with all standrds comfort of 3* hotel.Room size was bigger than average room size compare to other hotel in Germany. It would have been better if there will be more variety of cakes and pastries. However what they offer is more that suffucuent for good start of your day. Although we went during winter with temperaature -15-20celcius the rooms was always warm as the central heating was always on. Finally we do recoment this hotel a good choice, with central location to the majority of attraction and good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Excellant location for business trip, value for money!”
Reviews.Author: gpoonam13
Reviews.Content: I had been to Berlin on business trip in August 2010. I stayed in Apartment room on 11th floor for 3 weeks. The apartment was really big for a single person with living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom with W/C and small store room. Living room had a big window with curtains. The scenery from it was really beautiful. Living room had TV with most German channels and few English channels, sofa, T-poy, small cupboard, small dining table with 2 chairs, ironing board with iron. Kitchen was small but well equipped with 4 burner stove, small refrigerator, microwave oven, dish washer, toaster, tea/coffee maker. It had all required utensils like cooking pans, small & big sized plates, bowls, glasses, spoons, wine glasses, serving bowls, serving spoons, scissor, knives. Bedroom was medium sized. The wooden cupboard occupied one entire wall. The cupboard had hangers to hang clothes and mirror. There was a small packet of needle and threads kept in the cupboard. The double bed was very cozy. It had 2 side tables with drawers, out of which one had a lamp. The room had a big window with curtains similar to the one in living room. The bathroom was big with bath tub, shower cabin, W/C, washbasin and dustbin. There were also 4 towels, soap, hair gel kept. The shower cabin and washbasin had hot and cold water. The store room had the front door washing machine. The passage had a big clothes stand for drying clothes. It also had an umbrella. The Wi-Fi internet was complimentary. I never faced any major connection problems except for once or twice. The room cleaning was done every alternate day. I had opted for daily breakfast which cost me 5 Euros per day. It had lot of options to choose from. Since I am a vegetarian, I had to choose from fresh fruits, boiled and scrambled eggs, cakes, 3-4 types of bread with 3-4 types of jam, butter, 2 juices, tea, coffee machine, milk, corn flakes, muesli, etc. The breakfast room was spacious and the staff was very helpful. The reception had some complimentary things like toffees, railway map, etc. The receptionists came in shift. I found all of them very polite and helpful. They knew English. The hotel had 2 lifts, out of which one was quite slow. People had to wait for lift for long in the mornings as all of them wanted to go to first floor for breakfast or for work. The nearest railway station, Potsdamer Platz, is at walking distance of 2-3min. There are lot of bakeries and restaurants nearby. The remains of Berlin Wall are at a walking distance of 5min. Lot of sightseeing places like Brandenburger Tor, Berliner Dom, Tier Garten, Memorial of killed Jews, Jewish Museum are at a walking distance of 15-20min. Potsdamer Platz also has a shopping mall.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, why so low on the ratings????”
Reviews.Author: ceseria
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel right in the middle of berlin, 2 minutes down the road from Potsdammerplatz. We has an appartment on the 14th floor of the hotel with wonderful sights over berlin. The appartment itself was very spaceous with a massive bathroom, living room, kitchen and wash room. Our stay was due to the travel chaos caused by the volcanic eruptinon, the staff could not be more heloful to us. Great breakfast with a wide vareity of meats, cereals, hot food, juices and drinks . Orignially we had been staying in the Holiday Inn express down the road, howvere this hotel was far superior and would recommend to anyone. Underground 2 mins walk and a great eatting places minutes away.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel BelAhr
HotelInfo.Address: Stresemannstrasse 97, 10963 Berlin, Germany
